hero.title: Break Language Barriers with AI-Powered Translation
hero.subtitle: Professional video transcription and dubbing, multilingual interview chat, and PDF translation. All powered by advanced AI technology supporting 100+ languages.

features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need to translate and localize your content across languages

videoTranscription.title: Video Transcription
videoTranscription.description: Paste any YouTube URL and get instant transcriptions with real-time translation in 100+ languages.

chat.title: Interview Guide
chat.description: AI-powered interview preparation assistant with multilingual support. Get help with behavioral, technical, and industry-specific interview questions.

documentTranslation.title: Document Translation
documentTranslation.description: Translate PDF and Word documents (DOCX) while preserving formatting and structure.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, fast, and professional translation in three easy steps

step1.title: Choose Your Tool
step1.description: Select from video transcription, chat, or document translation based on your needs.

step2.title: Upload or Input
step2.description: Provide your content - paste a URL, upload a file, or start typing your message.

step3.title: Get Results
step3.description: Receive professional-quality translations instantly with downloadable outputs.

cta.title: Ready to Break Language Barriers?
cta.subtitle: Start translating your content today with our AI-powered platform. No credit card required to get started.

branding.title: LinguaFlow
branding.subtitle: Break Language Barriers with AI-Powered Translation
branding.description: Welcome to the future of global communication. Sign in to continue or create an account to get started.

signin.title: Welcome Back
signin.subtitle: Sign in to continue to LinguaFlow

transcription.pageDescription: Paste a YouTube URL below to get instant transcription and translation in your target language. Download results as TXT or SRT format.

processing.message: This may take a few minutes depending on video length

error.title: Transcription Failed
error.message: An error occurred during transcription. Please try again.
error.tip: Tip: Make sure the video has captions or subtitles enabled.

empty.title: No transcription yet
empty.description: Enter a YouTube URL above and click "Transcribe Video" to get started.

toast.processingDescription: Your video is being transcribed. This may take a few minutes.
toast.transcriptionCompletedDescription: Your video has been successfully transcribed. Click 'Translate' to translate it.

dubbing.title: Video Dubbing
dubbing.description: Generate a dubbed video with AI-generated voice in
dubbing.processingDetail: This may take several minutes. AI is creating voice-over and merging it with the video.
dubbing.successDetail: Your video has been dubbed with AI-generated voice. Download the files below.

toast.dubbingDescription: Your video is being dubbed with AI voice. This may take several minutes.
toast.downloadDescription: Your dubbed video is downloading automatically.
toast.autoDownloadDescription: Please use the download button to get your video.

empty.title: Welcome to Interview Guide
empty.description: Ask me any interview questions! I can help you prepare for behavioral, technical, or industry-specific interviews. I'll provide detailed answers, examples, and feedback in any language.

input.placeholder: Ask an interview question... (e.g., 'Tell me about yourself' or 'What are your strengths?')
input.keyboardHint: Press Enter to send, Shift + Enter for new line

upload.dragDrop: Drag & Drop a file here or click to browse

empty.title: No translations yet
empty.description: Upload a document to get started

toast.translationCompletedDescription: Your document has been successfully translated.
toast.noFileDescription: Please select a document to upload.
toast.invalidFileDescription: Please select a PDF or DOCX file.
